„ÄêAndroid 12 Smartphone & Helio G25 Octa Core & NFC„ÄëThe latest Android 12 unlocked cell phone equips 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM and an octa-core processor to provide a smooth scrolling experience and multi-tasking operation. External TF card storage up to 512GB. (NFC Support)
„Äê6.0″ HD Smooth Touching Screen„ÄëUnlocked android phones with a bright 6.0″ HD screen provides crisp, clear images to upgrade your visual experience. Dual sim cell phone equips Face ID unlocked making it operate with ease.
„Äê4200mAh Long Battery Life„ÄëSupport 10W Type-C quick charging DOOGEE X97 Pro unlocked smartphone is long-lasting to browse social media, game playing, and do phone chating without interruption. Android 12 phone equips OTG function that directly connects for data transmission and supports reverse charging. Charge other devices which in lower battery condition. 10 days standby, 1-2 days of everyday use, and 16 hours of calling.
„ÄêTriple Camera System„ÄëDOOGE X97 Pro smartphone with12MP AI main camera, 2MP portrait camera, and stunning selfies with a 5MP front-facing camera to capture crisp moment.
„ÄêSatisfaction Guaranteed„ÄëDOOGEE is committed to providing our consumers the absolute best value and quality on our entire line of rugged smartphones. As DOOGEE smartphone valued members, you have a 2-year free warranty, 30 days of money back without reason, and a 7/24 professional team here to serve you with any problems.
